Summary: as i was sitting outside at about 8:30 on a june evening , i looked up towards the sky approximately north east direction when above the horizion i saw 5 bright round lights in the sky in formation. there were 3 round light in the back row ,2 in front.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside having a smoke on my back porch just looking up to the north east sky when from out ogf the horizion a series of round glowing light that moved in a deliberate formation caught my attention. I saw a row of 3 lights in the back and 2 more in the front formation. the back row was spaced evenely appart and while the 2 in the front row moves in a wavey pattern, or s shape but moved in the opposite direction from each other. this set of lights traveled quickly from horizion to horizion within 20 seconds. This is the formation i saw: 0 0 0 0) (0 The lights traveled across the sky west in a wavy pattern: except the back row stayed in a straight formation; the parenthesis show th direction the front lights were moving.
